description: Ghost-like projections created by Perona's Horo Horo no Mi Devil Fruit power. When these hollows pass through a person's body, they drain their will and motivation, causing severe depression and negative thoughts.

keyUsages.title: Negative Hollows Attack Luffy's Group
keyUsages.description: Perona's Negative Hollows pass through Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Robin, and Franky, causing them to become severely depressed and pessimistic.

strengths: Works on strong-willed individuals like Luffy and Zoro
Ghosts can pass through physical defenses
weaknesses: Ineffective against people who are already extremely negative (like Usopp)
Temporary effect that wears off over time
